original_title: A Primer for '2001: A Space Odyssey'
overview: Primer on the meaning, techniques and background of Stanley Kubrick's 1968 film "2001: A Space Odyssey." Keir Dullea, who starred in the film as astronaut Bowman, narrates on camera and over many excerpts from the film.
title: A Primer for '2001: A Space Odyssey'
